GameObject.KindOf: SELECTABLE CAN_ATTACK CAN_CAST_REFLECTIONS INFANTRY PRELOAD ATTACK_NEEDS_LINE_OF_SIGHT PATH_THROUGH_INFANTRY

AnimationState.Script: Prev = CurDrawablePrevAnimationState(); if Prev ~= "STATE_Kneeling" and Prev ~= "TRANS_ToMovingFromProne" then CurDrawableSetTransitionAnimState("TRANS_ToMovingFromProne") end
Prev = CurDrawablePrevAnimationState() if Prev == "STATE_Prone" then CurDrawableSetTransitionAnimState("TRANS_IdleToSelected") end

Prev = CurDrawablePrevAnimationState() if Prev ~= "STATE_Prone" and Prev ~= "TRANS_ToProne" and Prev ~= "TRANS_SelectedToProne" then CurDrawableSetTransitionAnimState("TRANS_ToProne") end if Prev == "STATE_SelectedPose" then CurDrawableSetTransitionAnimState("TRANS_SelectedToProne") end if Prev == "STATE_stunned_flailing" then CurDrawableSetTransitionAnimState("STATE_stunned_landing") end

Prev = CurDrawablePrevAnimationState() if Prev == "STATE_Prone" then CurDrawableSetTransitionAnimState("TRANS_IdleToSelected") end
